pullrequest.title: Respect null-call clause in SQL function execution
pullrequest.body: fixes #13761 ``` == RELEASE NOTES == General Changes * Fix SQL function execution not respecting null-call clause ```

pullrequest.title: Propagate stats and cost in distributed explain plans
Add getBlockedQueuedQueries to InternalResourceGroup
pullrequest.body: resolves #7931 blockedQueuedQueries of a resource group is the number of queries that can run on its subgroups but blocked on this resource group.

pullrequest.title: Support Block as first State in TwoNullableValueState
Make INCLUDING, EXCLUDING, and PROPERTIES unreserved keywords
Allow expressions in simple case statements
Add execution support for CUBE, ROLLUP and GROUPING SETS
Fix exception during plan duplicate columns in order by clause
Fix could not fetch data from Kafka
pullrequest.body: fix #2704 The error is caused by split.getNodes().get(0) in KafkaRecordSet. This IP should be partition's leader, and the error code '6' occurs when it is not partition's leader.

pullrequest.title: Add support for quoted time related keywords.( CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIM...
pullrequest.body: resolves #2111 Add support for quoted time related keywords.( CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIME, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LOCALTIME, LOCALTIMESTAMP )

pullrequest.title: Fix scheduling for information_schema tables
pullrequest.body: fix #1823: In distributed env, the queries on information schema tables must be performed on the coordinator despite of the configuration said 'no jobs on coordinator', since the coordinator is the only one that has the cache.

pullrequest.title: Fix Sys table count star error
